metadata.synopsis: Default Dialogs for Baldur's Mouth Guard 2
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guards in the Writing Room

0.speaker: Guard Vlomina
0.text: 'Fraid I'll have to ask you to stop there. Only Ettvard's allowed to use the basement elevator.

1.speaker: Guard Vlomina
1.text: If you want to use the elevator, speak to Ettvard. I've been told no one's allowed down to the basement.
